articles.title: Man who married teacher that raped him cared for her 24/7 as she was dying of cancer - Mirror Online
articles.description: Mary Kay Letourneau died from colon cancer on Monday, aged 58, with her estranged partner Vili Fualaau, reportedly at her bedside round the clock in her final days
articles.content:
A man who married the school teacher who raped him when he was a boy cared for her 24/7 in the final days of her cancer fight.
